description: This file defines Flutter widget classes for displaying transaction and budget cards in a finance tracking app. It includes two main stateless widgets: TransactionListTile for individual transactions and BudgetCard for budget overview, utilizing custom styling, gradients, and animations.

classes.name: TransactionListTile
classes.description: A widget for displaying a transaction item with animated transition and customizable actions.

classes.name: BudgetCard
classes.description: A widget for visualizing a budget category with progress indicator and status color.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for each of the two widget classes.
